Package asap.speechengine

Engine for TTS.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TimedTTSUnitFactory
    Factory to create TimedTTSUnits
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DirectTTSUnitFactory
    Factory to generate DirectSpeechUnits
    TimedAbstractSpeechUnit
    Skeleton implementation for TimedSpeechUnits.
    TimedDirectTTSUnit
    Used to speak directly through the TTS system
    TimedTTSUnit
    A TimedPlanUnit that contains speech played back through a TTS system, either directly or via a .wav file
    TimedWavTTSUnit
    Plans speech by generating a .wav file, then uses that .wav file to generate the speech
    TTSPlanner
    Planner that creates and plans TimedTTSUnits from e.g.
    WavTTSUnitFactory
    Factory to generate WavSpeechUnit
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SpeechUnitPlanningException
    Exception in the planning of a timed speech unit

Package asap.speechengine Description

Engine for TTS. The connection through TTS systems is arranged to SpeechBindings (MaryTTSBinding, MSSapiBinding, ..), which should be in the library path (= resolved through ivy).
See Also:
AsapRealizer Wiki for setup information
